title: An aqueous Zn-polyoxometalate battery for decoupled hydrogen production from alkaline water electrolysis
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00331D, Paper
Xin-Qing Wang, Meng-Jiao Liu, Xiao-Yuan Wu, Sa-Sa Wang, Weiming Wu, Can-Zhong Lu
Decoupled water electrolysis is a feasible technique for the large-scale production of high-purity H2, in which heteropolyacids are attractive electron-coupled proton buffers. An aqueous Zn-phosphomolybdic acid battery is designed to...
